content.detailedDescription:
The first time that i saw the thing was when i was playing basketball outside at night. i was just dribbling the ball when something caught my attention out of the corner of my eye. i looked at the top of the wooden gate/fence that was behind the hoop and i saw something with big eyes looking at me. as soon as we made eye contacted it dropped behind the fence. i ran to the fence and looked behind it and the thing was gone. the whole siting lasted for about 3-4 seconds. i thought that i was just seeing this so i just went inside and kept the whole ordeal to myself. 

the next time is the one that made me realize that i was actually seeing something real. i had just dropped off my friends at their house and was now coming up to my house. i started to pull down into the driveway whe i looked down the small hill to the base of the drive way and saw this 2-3ft tall, grey-ish green-ish, blue-ish skinny thing with a abnormally large head and big eyes run across the driveway, around the fence, and towards the back off my house. i was so scared the i swerved away from my driveway and drove around my neighborhood until i felt it was okay to go home. when i got home no one was awake. i immediately turned on all the lights in my house and then went to bed. while in bed, i heard a strange whistling noise coming from outside my window (which is behind the fence). my phone then turned off for no reason. i took a long time for it to go back on.

both of the "sightings" happens at about 11:45pm and were right after thunderstorms.
content.summary: I've seen this thing twice. i was very scared the second time

content.detailedDescription: I was feeding the horses late at about 11:30 p.M.  and the nights before i saw what i beleived to be the space station go through.  so, in looking up to the ne, i noticed these bright flashing lights.  the green and red caught my eye.  as i studied it i thought maybe a plane or heliocopter.  just then 2 planes were passing by.  one going east the other west just below the bright lit object.  there was no comparision to the object and size.  the planes were very small compaired to the object.  also, the planes had to be closer.  i watched for about 2 minutes then called out my 2 sons to witness it.  they both agreed it was no plane.  just what it was i don't know, maybe a satilite or something else.  who know's.  after over an hour it still in the same spot!!!
content.summary: Bright lights flashing, object never moved, it's not the space station, humming sound in distance. after 1 hour still in same place.

content.detailedDescription: First of all, i am drug and alcohol free. i was smoking a cigarette on my way back home at around 9:30 pm. i looked up slowly when i noticed a bright light in the sky. at first i thought shooting star but it was moving far too slow. i squinted to see better and noticed it was 3 white lights flashing in a triangular formation. traffic was really low at the time but i still couldnt hear the object emitting any noise at all. i couldnt see an outline either. it was moving from east to west in a perfect straight line. had to be at least a mile up. ive never been a firm believer of ufos or aliens but this has made me want to look into it further. i hope others have experienced this as well
content.summary: Flasing white lights in triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was out looking for the meteor shower early and all of a sudden i saw these large glowing orange lights coming towards my house. at first i thought they were helicopters but they were weird and fuzzy looking. as they got close to me they seemed to be chasing each other and bobbing up and down then they moved to the south east...Two seemed to fly towards each other then one looked like it flew around and behind the other one and then side by side they kept going and the further they went the smaller and dimmer they got until they were the size of small stars up in the stars then they disappeared. then one single one came from the same direction and flew the same direction where the other ones went. this one seemed to move faster until it too disappeared way up high.

i called for my husband to come see and he didn't know what they were either. the light was much larger than jets and from afar they looked like wide light bulbs or parasails but orange and glowing.
content.summary: 5-6 orange glowing large lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub and noticed 4 different blue slowly pulsating light about loveland, colorado . i immediately believed they were ufos because i have never seen anything like it. the bright lights randomly flashed in increments of about 5 seconds and randomly moved throughout the sky. after about an hour they disappeared. i was in awe.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright blue lights randomly flashing in three directions

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside on balcony taking pictures of sunrise.  i have done this many times but never videoed.  all at once, i thought "i have never filmed the sunrise".  i turned my camera to "record" and videoed a short segment of sunrise.

i did not see it as i was filming..It was too fast.  upon viewing the video enlarged, i saw a small craft going incredibly fast over the city.  it takes a jet 65-73 seconds to take off from the airport and go over the city and be above my building.  this craft crossed the city in 2.5 secs. (about a 20 mile section).

after filming this, i went back over pictures taken from my balcony.  i see strange lights in some.  two weeks ago, while in the mountains, i took a picture from my car and caught a strange light anomaly.  my son, husband and i saw 3 green orbs from our apartment last year.  they hovered, flowed into one and disappeared.  they were a glowing, phosphorous green color.  my husband has no memory of it but my son and i do.

i have had this video viewed by one other person who took it, enlarged it, and viewed it frame by frame.  he says it is either saucer or cigar shaped, at an incredible speed and on an upward trajectory. it seems to come from nowhere.
content.summary: Video from balcony

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work with my sister in the car heading south on a1a near the address mentioned (near a walgreens). i observed an unusual tight cluster of pulsing blue/white lights in the sky; star-like. it was cloudy outside so the light was slightly obscured. i initially believed the light to be an airplane traveling west but then the light switched direction toward the east. after traveling east for a short duration the object stopped in mid-air "hovering" in place. after a short duration the object began to descend straight-down rapidly until it disappeared behind a building (the walgreens). the descent took approx. 15 seconds. the object appeared to land. 

both me and my sister observed the event.
content.summary: Unusual blue light descends straight downward

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my back yard i noticed that there was a storm frount coming through the mountain pass from the south 15 minits later a sand storm came through it passed in an other 15 minits then i saw a storm cloud in the pass haeding north in my direction it was dusk not sure of real time. then i noticed that ther were balls of light in the clouds.I looked at the mountain that were also dark to see if it was my eyes playing tricks on me. the cloud frount was directly overhead in short i decided that i was seeing things and contenued to watch these lights "dance" in this storm cloud that had no rain,. around two hours later i looked south tward the pass and i saw slow moving normal lights fling on the eastern edge of the cloud in single file. just above me was, what turned out to be the 3rd to the last one. then on of those specks of lghts shot from behind it ,out lined the tail went over the top sht up around feet and cicled at least twice. i thought ok it is a hilicopter since my holucenation just out lined it.Heres the kicker the nextchoppercame the that same spot and turned on his search light and pointed it into the cloud.Thats when i realized i was not the only one seeing these things.At that second another spek appeared right in frount of this chopper the pilot wasd it too and,in a jurking motion turned the spot to his frount the light was an orb.It  flew over the top of the chopper in annorthly direction.And the came the last chopper with its lights point down with two orbs in it. i kept watching and 20 min later i saw a orange oval on the other side of the yard it moved tward me very slowly, 10 to 15 min, then disapeared next to the house.Theres more but im not the bvst typest. the cloud finaly passed around 1130 pm.
content.summary: Laclick rge dark storm cloud contained objects and took 5 hrs to pas over military air craft was there 2 hrs intio sighting tthety saw it too turn on search lights

content.detailedDescription: A strange ball (sphere) with the color of a luminescent copper had an irregular path ascending in the area of 33177, miami florida. the surface seemed wrinkly instead of smooth. seen in the morning....
content.summary: Copper ball

content.detailedDescription:
4:description of the object(s): all black boomerang shape. or like the stealth bomber that can stop in mid flight.  first object from left to right,  moving in a normal straight line like a passenger jet. then about a head turn, corner of the eye, in the peripheral field of view to the right, we noticed a second identical craft on the same normal straight path but right to left as to head exactly towards the 1st craft. at this point we focused on the 2 as they were about the same size and same altitude as to be on a head on collision but moving casually as high up passenger jets apear to be moving from a ground perspective. then that's when it got weird. a 3rd craft appeared from the left and a 4th from the right and 5th from the left and so on until there was about 4 on each side heading in a head on collision path but moving very casual. for example extend both of your arms straight up above you as to give a double high5 to the sky not like diving in a pool but more like a hand stand now focus on your finger tips and slowly bring your hands together as to touch finger tips to finger tips, and stop, leaving about 1 inch of space so your hands don't touch. that's exactly what the objects did. once they met in the sky, both groups stopped at the same exact time not in any organized fashion just 4 on the left and 4 on the right all 4 next to each other on the left all 4 next to each other on the right and a gap between both groups. they did not move for what seemed to be minutes but was most likely 30-45 seconds. then they did a "jump". meaning we could see the quick movements of their path but more like a flash as if to continue their path in either direction but vanishing. we saw them all "jump" at the same time. they disappeared no smoke no noise no flash no lights. nothing just gone. 1. friends front yard looking skyward. 2 saw a second object.                    3 airplane.
5: confused scared and afraid. i was 10 at the time and never had an interest in ufo's. i was so scared that i had my friends dad walk me home during they day not night time but broad day light, about 5 houses down from where we were, my friend ran inside his house and we didn't go outside all day after that..I remember telling my parents but as usual who believes anything a 10 year old has to say? 
6. they were facing each other and they did a "jump" very fast movements and vanished, turned invisible, teleported who knows? kinda like watching ants on the ground but do a freeze frame, then push play but right as they take the first step they disappear.
content.summary: 6-10 boomerang like aircraft. 6 moving towards 6 other similar like craft

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching! the sky for  astroids.I took some pictures and was surprised when i found these pictures. you must see these pictures for yourself.
content.summary: There was no moon but i have a picture of a fullmoon like craft.Also a small craft(ufo).

content.detailedDescription: I saw gray
content.summary: I saw it 3 feet away

content.detailedDescription:
South wales valleys

at around 11pm on august 12th 2013

i was busy walking back and forth the kitchen window keeping an eye out for shooting stars when i noticed, straight ahead of me to the west, a large star like light heading towards me through the sky.

at first i thought it might be a satellite but then as i looked i thought it was much too large.

it carried on as far as i could tell in a straight trajectory until it was almost directly above and then seemed to fade out quite quick. 

the whole thing took around five minutes

later that evening while talking shooting stars with a friend, she said that she had also seen the unexplainable object but from a slightly different angle.
content.summary: Large star like object aproached from the east in a straight flight path, dissapearing as in got roughly over head.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in canada for a week living in a fishing cabin.  it was 10 miles from the nearest road and the only access was by boat.  it was about 40 miles north of international falls.  

in the early morning of thursday, 8/8 (~2:15am) i was awakened with the strong desire to go outside and see the stars.  not having done that while on that vacation i slowly pulled myself out of my warm bed (no heat in cabin), dressed and went outside to view the sky.

i went down to the dock which had the best view and stood observing the incredible cloudless night sky.  i could see everything from the northwest all the way to the southwest.  due west was in the trees.  i watched a number of polar orbit satellites as they traversed the sky.  the milky way was incredibly vivid!  i also saw a half dozen meteors (easily detectible since they would quickly flare out, take a somewhat ballistic trajectory, and they were very fast).

after about 10 minutes i saw a particularly bright satellite (as bright as the brightest planet) appear just to the left of polaris (pretty close to yildun, the 2nd star of the little dipper handle).  again, this was a very bright object.

this object started a slow trajectory (very slow even compared with polar satellites) directly towards the point on the big dipper where the handle meets the pan.  it took ~30-40 seconds to make this transition across the sky and the trajectory was a very straight line!  but this wasn't all!

after ~5 seconds from first observation the large bright object started to spawn smaller objects moving away from the larger object in straight lines!!  these were much dimmer than the parent.  an example is that one left and moved down at an approximate 45 degree trajectory from the parent.  some of the ~20 objects in total continued on straight lines to the horizon, others (~30%) after getting a little distance from the parent took very sharp ~22.5 degree turns to come on the same trajectory as the parent.    some of the smaller objects made multiple 'angular' turns in different directions (~5 did this).  most of the objects maintained the same speed of the ���parent��� but ~7 of them sped off to the horizon at a much faster speed.

all of the smaller objects 

1) left the parent in straight lines (~45% from parent trajectory), 
2) did not burn up, flare, or otherwise disintegrate,
3) were observable until they went over the horizon.
4) i didn't observe any blinking lights or other types of navigational lights on any objects.
5) none of the objects ever took a curved trajectory, always straight lines.
6) some of the smaller objects matched the parent in speed and trajectory while others were ~25 - 50% faster and quickly went over the horizon.
7) some of the smaller objects went east, others west.  i didn't notice any objects reversing course and going south over my head.
8) smaller objects appeared to stop 'spawning' from the parent as the parent go closer to the big dipper handle.  last observed departure was when parent was ~1 big dipper pan depth from handle (don't know how to otherwise describe distance).

after the large object reached the handle of the big dipper it quickly dimmed and was not visible. as a note, the big dipper was not too far from the horizon and visibility due to atmospheric thickness became worse the closer to the horizon the object was.

whole event lasted ~40 seconds and was like a fireworks show!!!  even though i looked hard for another 1/2 hour i didn't see anything else like this.  

whoever they are the executed a perfect 'insertion'.  it was quick, very effective and after 40 seconds all assets were not visible and on their way to ultimate targets.  if only the us military could be this effective.

wish they could have done a 'fly-by' so i could have seen them up close!!

-----------

just wanted to share my experience with you.  hope you can add it to the 'archives'.

just another weird day on earth!
content.summary: Insertion of approximately 20 objects

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in town then i was what looked like a plane in the air, but it had no con trail and it had a shape that was unlike any plane i have ever seen. as i watched, it kept its path and turning into what i can only describe as a moving star. then it changed shape again into a small round but almost tear drop shape. i crossed the road so i broke eye contact for a second and it was gone without a trace.
content.summary: Strange looking plane, turned into star, then small tear drop shape, then gone

content.detailedDescription:
That night i had trouble sleeping, i moved from one place to another and felt heat.
time passed, hours i think, when i feel something watching me from my feet. (i would like to clarify that since childhood paranormal things happen to me, then i could manage quite well the fear) i sat up to see who had this once at my feet, then i see what i never imagined seeing in my home. an alien, one which many describe, gray, approximately five feet, big eyes, long and black.
my intention was to talk to him, but then he approached me and held my thumb. that made me fall back and faint.
i woke up, i was in a stone building with no glass windows, i went through one of those windows, i was alone, but then, through a window in front of me, a person came with a gun in his hand, shooting, someone else appeared behind me, shooting well, the first person i saw ran away, but one of his bullets went into my stomach, and had blood touched me, i fell back, as he watched the two men leave, shooting. something came behind me, grabbed my shirt and pulled me back. i fainted. when i awoke, i was in a operating room with two people, one to my left i could not see, only hear. and a doctor in front of me.
full of contempt, threw dust on my gunshot wound, now my wound had tubes coming out of it, the dust also fell on my face, my soul began to leave my body, i thought i would die, i listened to the person who had to my left, the person asking the doctor to save me, suddenly everything changed, i began to remember that people who had been shooting were not human, they were aliens, my soul back to the body, and i saw the doctor that was actually a alien, the other person on my left, still could not see. my attention went to the doctor, he was doing something to my injury, i tried to move, but could not, the doctor looked angry, i was worried it would not make things right, then the injection brought a very large, i do not know how, but i managed to free my right hand and took the doctor's hand, held the large injection and wrestled with the doctor, his skin was cold, dry, bony, but it was stronger than me. i argued with one hand and with the other he injected me. again, my soul began to leave the body, i thought i probably had died. but then, i woke up in my bed, the blankets on the floor, my body took a while to feel fully awake. i looked at my husband slept on my right.
i picked up the blankets and went back to sleep. i thought it was a dream. the next morning i told my husband everything. the day went normal, but the unthinkable happened. the next morning, about 8 am, it was sunday, my husband woke up first, he felt that something was at our feet, then he saw an alien standing, looking at us when my husband reacted, the alien took a step back and disappeared.
i should add:
since i was twelve, i used to write my dreams every day, if i try to remember this experience, without reading it, i can not remember exactly. but there are images that i do not forget, as the image of the alien doctor.
my husband is not afraid of the unknown. he was calm when he saw the being.
content.summary: Entity came to my bed

content.detailedDescription: In my fathers backyard watching for meteor showers i noticed a red light emerging from behind the treeline along the fence to the north side of the yard, at first i thought it was just a regular plane but then it got to be more above us but still the distance of a regular plane would be but you could easily tell it was spherical shaped and it had a red orange flame-like pulse that was lighting it up, there were no sounds no trails or emissions, it moved very smoothly across the sky, there were four of us in the backyard that saw it clearly and all of us agreed it was something we have never seen before i was in awe by what it may be or what it is doing, the object kept traveling southeast and eventually started to dim and vanished so we could no  longer see it. as we were gathering our thoughts after this experience we were all shocked and nobody knew what to think about it other than a ufo, about ten minutes pass and a second one rises from the treeline in the same spot and travels the same exact path as the first looked the same exact way.
content.summary: Red orangish pulsating orb ascended from behind the treeline north, then continued to fly southeast and dimly vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside around a fire watching the sky for possible meteors. saw a couple. i noticed two glowing lights flying across the sky, slower than a meteor and faster than a plane / satellite. they were the same size and moving at exactly the same speed flying perpendicular, one slightly in front of the other. lost sight of it over the horizon. they made no sound, no blinking lights, left no trail. they came from the north and moved directly south. about 5 minutes later one light came back moving at the exact same speed, following the exact same path, except starting in the south headed north.
content.summary: Glowing lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife an i were at an intersection heading home when a guy on a bike and a car were on the side median pointing into the sky by the gas station. we looked up and i saw what looked to be a stealth bomber at first but did not have the staggered tail. just straight across with a slot in the back. you can tell it was huge by the outline and as many stars it covered while it was moving. we were all asking each other what that was. no one knew. didnt make any sound and didnt have any lights. we talked about it all night until my wife got sick of hearing about it.
content.summary: Large triangle craft, no lights, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to the local sunoco to buy cigarettes down warren avenue heading south and something caught my eye. i looked up into the sky and saw a (larger than an airplane)fireball looking sphere moving through the sky. i observed it for a little over two minutes. at first it appeared to be slowly moving north-east or ascending towards the north-east. after about a minute and a half it made a abruptly sharp turn towards the east. for about 10 seconds it headed east, slowly turning south-east and then it seemed to pick up speed and began to fade/disappear. 

3. i wasn't sure what to think of it at first.
5. i was amazed with the object and stood in the same spot for 2 minutes to watch it, it kept my attention.
content.summary: A glowing fireball in the sky that looked like nothing else.

content.detailedDescription: August 13, 2013: me and my friends decided to have a normal grill party at a house in the outskits of a bigger city. once it got dark we were amazed by the stars and one of us came up with an idea to get some chairs and organize a so to say mini "comethunt". by this time it was around midnight and 7-8 of us were gazing directly up at the sky. i have a personal addiction to watch the stars almost every night, an because of this i'm quite confidant to say that i can distinguish stars from satellites and other commercial airplanes that usually cross our part of the sky. after sharing some of my knowledge with the others on what to look for, and what they can actually see, a good hour or so has gone by and we've seen about a dozen of comets (i apologise if i'm using the wrong term). one of us made a comment on how breath-taking the view is, and i responded by saying: " yea, times like these that keep me believing that we are not alone out there. " i have to admit that the mere idea of life existing anywhere else has always kept me secretly wanting to find out the "truth", i did my own researches based upon collecting every possible bit of data on topics concerning all the branches that lead out of the main idea of et life. my goal is to know about everything, even if its a lie, hoax, fake or maybe real, i wanna have my own personal database and by time trim of the unnecessary parts, and say " yea guys, i knew this way back." nevermind i just think this information was needed to properly make a judgement. 1-2 minutes later it suddenly happened, on a clear part of the sky, this huge black object appeared, everybody yelled suddenly to score a new comet for themselves, but then we realised that its something different, it was definitely cigar shaped and quite large. had two lights , one on the very front and one on the back, they were red and quite bright. without any sound it made its way from w to e and while we were looking at it, it made a what happened to be like a small correction to its flightpath. this was the point when everybody was really excited, some of us were asking, what is that thing?, others were trying to help the rest spot it. in a short time period it started to speed up a little and fade out, this is the closest i can describe it, the interesting thing was that the lights came closer to each other, and at that moment i questioned myself, is that really one object ( maybe it was two separate just had an optical illusion of seeing it as one , or vice versa) . after fading, my first reaction and thought was simply : " reptilians" . i don't know why this came to my head, but it just simply did, after the sighting we summarized with the others what it might have been, and checked if any of us had missing time.
content.summary: Sudden appearance of a cigar-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was taking images if six high altitude planes flying together from east to west.  after i took a few shots,  i took. video of the planes. then i reviewed my images and found that out. of the few that i took there was an orb in one image very clear.
content.summary: Taking images of 6planes flying high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Its a festive here at my home..Malaysian muslim celebrated 3rd day of eid!!..As exciting as it sounds..Stress is another problem..Suddenly i have an urged to go outside an observing the sky..Just for relieve some stress..As i watched the stars,some stars really weird looking..And brightess among other stars..My mom was satnding next to me..Swiping the floor..And i tell a joke that "there is a ufo celebrating eid too haha.."..My mother doesn't feel anything strange..I decided to pull my smartphone an recorded the event..The image was blur..As i was zooming,there is another shape like triangle floating right next to the bright thingy stars..And the shape was dimmer...I strunggling to find good image.Trying different angle..When i do that the "ufo" is moving slowly to south..Its like turning a car to u turn..It disappeared..Try to find again but cannot..
content.summary: 5 pointer triangle shaped aand the flew away to south..I recorded it..Mp4

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out of the south-west facing window of our apartment (near chauderon, lausanne) for meteorites (the peak of the perseid shower was last night). i had been leaning out of the darkened apartment for at least 15 minutes, which overlooks a darkened courtyard, so my eyes had become accustomed to the darkness.

at roughly 1:45am, i saw an object moving rapidly on the left side of my field of view, roughly in a southern direction. i thought initially it must be a meteorite which i'd been spotting at the corner of my field of view for the last couple of nights, so turned to focus at it. i was surprised when it didn't disappear before i could focus on it and secondly thought it must be a  low flying plane. when focused on it i then noticed it was 3 lights/orbs in a perfect triangle formation, coming to an extended point at the front of the 3 and moving across the sky in a straight line to the west/north west. they were larger than any of the stars in the sky, or meteorites i'd seen, but much duller, almost blurry and of a yellowy-orangey tinge. the lights were constant in their brightness for the entire time and were only just bright enough to see. i watched it go across almost the entirety of the sky visible from my apartment window before it disappeared into cloud above to my right. this took somewhere around 7-8 seconds.

it looked as though there was what i can only describe as heat haze around the lights and in between them all. i could not see a distinct outline of an object, but i had the impression it was a triangular black object with the lights being underneath it, rather than right on the extremities of the wings and nose as you would see on an aeroplane. there was a distinct lack of sound as it flew over (i don't really get any city noise at that time where i am), although i could swear i heard a quiet low humming noise, which seemed to linger for a few seconds after it had passed. 

i couldn't quite work out the perspective as i viewed it and it seemed either very large or very low (or perhaps both). i'd say it looked slightly larger than a passenger jet and like it was flying only a few hundred feet up. my initial thought was that it was following the north edge of lake geneva (it would have been over either that or the south side of town), but looking at a map it must have been heading in a north westerly direction the entire time i was viewing it and the lake takes a south-westerly turn on the west side of lausanne.

my reaction from about halfway through the sighting was for every hair on my body to stand on end. i felt shocked and after losing sight of it woke my fiance up to tell her, but she hugged me while half asleep and fell asleep again. that made me calm down a bit, but i then wrote my account down and told a friend on the internet. at about 2:15pm i went back to the window to watch out for lights rather than the meteorites which i'd now lost interest in and downloaded an app to enhance nighttime filming on my phone. i stood with my camera ready for the next 45 minutes or so taking some practice videos, but saw nothing more than a few more meteorites. the cloud cover had increased greatly by this point too, as only about 25% of the sky was visible, whereas it was more like 80-90% when i saw the lights.
content.summary: Black triangle headed w-nw in a straight path over lausanne

content.detailedDescription:
Light: as i was looking toward perseus from the front yard of my home for some comet debris action, i noticed a pulse of light near capella. i thought it was just a flicker from atmospheric disturbance, but when i focused on it, i saw nothing. then i saw another pulse not far from the first. the pulses of white light continued steadily, occuring every 10 seconds. they weren't quick, like the flashes of light on any aircraft i've before seen. they gradually gained luminance and dissipated at the same rate, spanning about one second. after 6 pulses, i saw no more flashes. the last two were not as bright as the first four. 

	movement: the object moved in (presumably, because i could see nothing besides the light pulses) a straight path due east. it started at about level with capella, just a few degrees to the left of it. its path went a few degrees under the star, and 5-10 degrees to the right and 3-5 degrees below it, the pulses faded.
	
	i heard no sound. i've felt completely normal all day and still do. it seemed very far away...But i'll leave the speculation up to you. apologies for approximations in measurements. i only have my hands to measure for the time being.
content.summary: White light pulses 10 seconds apart

content.detailedDescription: About 6-7 of us observing the night sky in rural area using telescopes. out of the corner of my eye i saw two lights, behind trees in the distance. i went to look more as the trees were in the way and i saw a third reddish-orange light like the other two. it slowly moved by and i told the others...Two or three came to look and saw the lights as well and then it suddenly vanished. we all agreed it was nothing like we have ever seen in our lives. it was a really large isosceles triangle...No craft seen, just the three lights. all were moving at the same speed none moved away from the other, then it vanished.
content.summary: Three lights shaped like an isoceles triangle seen in western sky, moving slowly then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Watching a pulsating object about two hours all colors not moving, my cell can not pick up a photo, i see another to the east at a much further distance.  it's pulsing all colors in pattern. can't be sure i think a black triangle underneath hard to tell.  will stay awake until it leaves.
content.summary: Watching still over an hour ne of anacortes very far away looks like a second much farther

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back porch,  i noticed right below cloud cover, off in the horizen  a unusual bright light. it appeared as a star at first glance.  the object hovered for around 10-15 seconds. the ufo appeared to be powering up its warp drive. the object got extremely bright the last 5 seconds of hovering then ejected itself from earth in a curved path heading away from earth. it left a tracer behind it that slowly faded away. it was mabey 3 seconds of tracer before it faded. i couldnt see where the object itself went after that due to the cloud cover . the clouds themself were overhead clouds with gaps in it were the night sky could be seen. yet the clouds did not obstruct the horizon sky north of my position either.
content.summary: Bright light warp drive into space leaving a tracer.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up out of dead sleep around 940 and went to cvs before it closed and pulling out of my neighborhood saw 3 orange orbs in a triangle formation. went home and watched them for 2 hours. they came up one by one and formed a triangle or straight or horizontal lines. they would dart off one by one and dissapear every 10 mins or so!
content.summary: Went to the store at 945 and saw 3 orange orbs in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed a strange egg shaped light whith a wierd pulse and it was right to the right of the andromeda galaxy when looking on my google sky app. slowely moved eastward the disaapeared. before disappersin it appeared to eject an object which slowly moved in the opposite direction.
content.summary: Was a strange light egg shaped to the right of the andromeda galaxy when looking on google sky app on phone
